snippet: Opel, the European unit of General Motors, said the closing of its plant in Bochum, Germany, would be deferred until after 2016, which would give the workers time to prepare.
abstract: Opel, the European unit of General Motors, says the closing of its plant in Bochum, Germany, will be deferred until after 2016, which will give the workers time to prepare.
lead_paragraph: Opel, the European unit of General Motors, said the closing of its plant in Bochum, Germany, would be deferred until after 2016, which would give the workers time to prepare.

headline.seo: Opel in Talks to Close Germany Plant After 2016
headline.main: Opel in Talks to Close Plant in Germany
headline.print_headline: Opel in Talks to Close Plant in Germany
